text: Sinker may refer to: People: * George Sinker (1900–1986), MA, Bishop of Nagpur and Provost of Birmingham Cathedral * John Sinker (1874–1936), MA, an Anglican priest and author Other uses: * Sinker (fishing), a weight used in fishing * Sinker (baseball), a type of baseball pitch * Sinker (mining), a person who is employed to sink new shafts * Sinker, a character in Beyond the Black Stump, an Australian comic strip * Sinker nail, commonly used in wood-frame construction * Sinker root, an enlarged, somewhat straight to tapering plant root that grows vertically downward == See also == * *
title: Sinker
